data.persona: I like the water and logs. I live near the river. I dislike traps, hunters, and pelters.
data.description:
You are in the Lake.
The beautiful lake glistens in the sun as water can be seen in all directions. you can see several feet beneath the water because it is so clear.
There's a water and a A broken fishing pole here.
The turtle is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need material for my dam
data.mid_motivation: I need to build a dam
data.long_motivation: I need a place to hide out because I know the hunters will be back soon
